official_title: To amend section 214 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1980 to make technical corrections.
short_title: Use of Assisted Housing By Aliens Technical Correction Act of 1997

summary.text: Use of Assisted Housing By Aliens Technical Correction Act of 1997 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1980, as amended by the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996, to make a technical correction.
